thread.title: Mary McCarthy
thread.title_full: Initial Hygiene IE reviewed by Mary McCarthy

author: Mary McCarthy
title: Mary McCarthy
text:
I recently change over to Initial. Very good experience with the sales rep from start to finish.
And the gentleman that changes our mats and towels every week is excellent, he is always very pleasant and our we always get the correct items from him.
It is a pleasure to deal with Initial Hygiene.
